text: numbalage paramadhipatigen pæhædili sadhaka numbala veta pæmina æta. ebævin kavareku eya (adhiksanaya kota) balanneda eya ohutama (hondak vanne)ya. namut kavareku (e gæna) andhayaku men katayutu karanne da eya ohutama erehivaya. tavada mama numbalage araksakaya novemi (yæyi nabivaraya! pavasanu)
